format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
\t\t\t\t

Lab Test

{{ doc.name }}\t\t\t\t

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "medical_code", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Medical Code"}, {"fieldname": "department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "status", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Sample Status"}, {"fieldname": "result_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Result Date"}, {"fieldname": "expected_result_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Expected Result Date"}, {"fieldname": "expected_result_time", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Expected Result Time"}, {"fieldname": "printed_on", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Printed on"}, {"fieldname": "invoiced", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Invoiced"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "patient", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Patient"}, {"fieldname": "inpatient_record", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Inpatient Record"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "practitioner", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Requesting Practitioner"}, {"fieldname": "practitioner_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Requesting Practitioner"}, {"fieldname": "requesting_department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Requesting Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "sales_invoice", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Sales Invoice"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "normal_test_items", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Normal Test Result", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "lab_test_name", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "lab_test_event", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "result_value", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "lab_test_uom", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "normal_range", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}]
html:
Patient Name : {{ doc.patient_name }}
File No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, ["patient_number"]) }}
Visit No. : {{ doc.sales_invoice }}
Consultant : {{ doc.practitioner_name or 'outpatient Doctor' }}
Age : {{ doc.patient_age }}
Gender : {{ doc.patient_sex }}
External No. :
Sample Date : {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(frappe.db.get_value("Sample Collection", doc.sample, ["creation"])).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %r",) }}
